name: Oscar Niemeyer
significant_buildings: Palácio da Alvorada - Cathedral of Brasília-National Congress of Brazil-Edifício Copan-Ibirapuera Park-United Nations headquarters- Niterói Contemporary Art Museum - Latin America Memorial -Gustavo Capanema Palace
significant_projects: Museum of Modern Art of Caracas
awards: 1963 Lenin Peace prize - 1988 Pritzker Prize - 1989 Prince of Asturias Awards - 1998 RIBA Royal Gold Medal - 2004 Praemium Imperiale
